title: what font?
content:
Hey ppl!  
I want to know how the fonts of follwing pictures are called:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081208063828im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Sweet_Harmony_by_shyne88_4386.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081208063828im_/http:/typophile.com/files/tattoo_regret_5934.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081208063828im_/http:/typophile.com/files/wesupportvda_4261.jpg)

I have no idea.  
I searched whole fontdownload pages and found nothing.

thanks for help!

Best greetz!

 [‹ NICK CATCHDUBS SLICK font id](http://web.archive.org/web/20081208063828/http:/typophile.com/node/49513 "Go to previous forum topic") [Greek Typeface / Bekkeriana ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081208063828/http:/typophile.com/node/49500 "Go to next forum topic")
author: xmatzeonex

comments.content: I’m probably wrong, but those look, to me, like they’ve been hand drawn; the flourishes wouldn’t work easily in a digital font.

I also agree that they are not from a font. That is artwork.

- Mike Yanega

hmm thats bad..  
butthankyou very much for help!  
greetz

@ dbeltechi..  
“painful” was a joke right? :D
